biotools.summary: The deep propensity network using a sparse autoencoder (DPN-SA) is a deep learning architecture for propensity score matching and counterfactual prediction to tackle the problems of high dimensionality, nonlinear/nonparallel treatment assignment, and residual confounding when estimating treatment effects.

bioschemas.name: DPN-SA
bioschemas.summary: The deep propensity network using a sparse autoencoder (DPN-SA) is a deep learning architecture for propensity score matching and counterfactual prediction to tackle the problems of high dimensionality, nonlinear/nonparallel treatment assignment, and residual confounding when estimating treatment effects.
